drupalNodeEvent.title: WildChina Book Club: Getting Things Done by Feng Tang

field_speakers.processed: Mei Zhang 张玫 (WildChina), Feng Tang 冯唐

field_description.processed: Join WildChina founder Mei Zhang as she chats with author Feng Tang about his book "Getting Things Done". We will be hosting this event first half on Zoom and second half Clubhouse. Access the Zoom here (Meeting ID: 926 9639 8442 Password: 631482), Clubhouse event here (https://www.joinclubhouse.com/event/PQYV2XwP), and follow host Mei Zhang @zhangmeijie and speaker Feng Tang on @benyibuer on Clubhouse.
